document_data.name: Deelin
document_data.mainbody: '''Deelin''' was a [[dwarf]] [[wizard]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Like almost all the other students of the [[Neverwinter Academy]], Deelin was fond of [[Aribeth de Tylmarande|Lady Aribeth]] and was grateful that she didn't blame all the wizards during the spreading of the [[Wailing Death]] and other events in Neverwinter.
document_data.Relationships: During the graduation ceremony in 1372 DR, Deelin was chatting with other students, [[Kiki]] and [[Fonlim]].
document_data.History: Deelin was a student of the Neverwinter Academy and finished her studies in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}. Deelin was one of the eight students, among whom was the future [[Hero of Neverwinter]], present at the graduation ceremony of that year. During the ceremony led by Lady Aribeth, the Academy was attacked and she fought against the mysterious [[mage]]s in the Graduation Chamber. It is not known if Deelin survived the attack.
